input.sentences: the annual family reunion happens very year at the campground . [male] sits in a chair laughing with family .
his cousin [female] contemplates the jokes he makes and tries not to laugh .
aunts and uncles from all around the state come to join the reunion as well | like aunt [female] and uncle [male]
[male] brought his camera to the reunion to document the fun and share photos with everyone later .
[female] 's dad and uncle [male] join the group as well at the reunion .
output.sentences: A man sits at the reunion.
The girl laughs and makes jokes.
